subject: [Radiance-general] Oconv: system - out of object space: Noenough space error
body:
Thank you all. I created a smaller unit (OBJ file is ~84 MB). obj2mesh
generates a light mesh ~16 MB and genBSDF runs fine.

Mostapha

On Mon, Feb 9, 2015 at 4:47 PM, giulioandrea antonutto foi <geotrupes at me.com
